function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher RH decreases airborne dispersal of viral particles","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission within indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Maintain indoor humidity between 40% and 60% to limit the spread of viruses","Technologies":"Humidifiers, dehumidifiers, HVAC systems with humidity control","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Higher humidity negatively impacts lipid-enveloped viruses through interactions with the polar membrane heads","Impact":"Risk of inactivation of lipid-enveloped viruses","Mitigation":"Ensure indoor humidity is maintained within the recommended range to minimize the inactivation of viruses","Technologies":"Humidity monitoring and control systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, healthcare providers","Owner":"Facility managers, healthcare facility administrators"},{"Description":"Changes in humidity impact susceptibility to infection and viral particle deposition in the respiratory tract","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to infection and deeper deposition of viral particles in the respiratory tract","Mitigation":"Maintain optimal indoor humidity levels to minimize the impact on susceptibility and viral particle deposition","Technologies":"Humidity monitoring and control systems, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, healthcare providers","Owner":"Facility managers, healthcare facility administrators"}]}
